verses.verse: And the lot<WH1486> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> according to their families<WH4940> was unto the border<WH1366> of Edom<WH123>, even to the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790> southward<WH5045>, at the uttermost part<WH7097> of the south<WH8486>.
And their south<WH5045> border<WH1366> was from the uttermost part<WH7097> of the Salt<WH4417> Sea<WH3220>, from the bay<WH3956> that looketh<WH6437> southward<WH5045>;

and it went out<WH3318> southward<WH5045> of the ascent<WH5045> of Akrabbim<WH4610>, and passed<WH5674> along to Zin<WH6790>, and went up<WH5927> by the south of Kadesh-barnea<WH6947>, and passed<WH5674> along by Hezron<WH2696>, and went up<WH5927> to Addar<WH146>, and turned about<WH5437> to Karka<WH7173>;

and it passed<WH5674> along to Azmon<WH6111>, and went out<WH3318> at the brook<WH5158> of Egypt<WH4714>; and the goings out<WH8444> of the border<WH1366> were at the sea<WH3220>: this shall be your south<WH5045> border<WH1366>.

And the east<WH6924> border<WH1366> was the Salt<WH4417> Sea<WH3220>, even unto the end<WH7097> of the Jordan<WH3383>. And the border<WH1366> of the north<WH6828> quarter<WH6285> was from the bay<WH3956> of the sea<WH3220> at the end<WH7097> of the Jordan<WH3383>;

and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to Beth-hoglah<WH1031>, and passed<WH5674> along by the north<WH6828> of Beth-arabah<WH1026>; and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to the stone<WH68> of Bohan<WH932> the son<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>;

and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to Debir<WH1688> from the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911>, and so northward<WH6828>, looking<WH6437> toward Gilgal<WH1537>, that is over against<WH5227> the ascent<WH4608> of Adummim<WH131>, which is on the south side<WH5045> of the river<WH5158>; and the border<WH1366> passed<WH5674> along to the waters<WH4325> of En-shemesh<WH5885>, and the goings out<WH8444> thereof were at En-rogel<WH5883>;

and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> by the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011> unto the side<WH3802> of the Jebusite<WH2983> southward<WH5045> (the same is Jerusalem<WH3389>); and the border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> that lieth before<WH6440> the valley<WH1516> of Hinnom<WH2011> westward<WH3220>, which is at the uttermost<WH7097> part of the vale<WH6010> of Rephaim<WH7497> northward<WH6828>;

and the border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> from the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> unto the fountain<WH4599> of the waters<WH4325> of Nephtoah<WH5318>, and went out<WH3318> to the cities<WH5892> of mount<WH2022> Ephron<WH6085>; and the border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> to Baalah<WH1173> (the same is Kiriath-jearim<WH7157>);

and the border<WH1366> turned<WH5437> about from Baalah<WH1173> westward<WH3220> unto mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165>, and passed<WH5674> along unto the side<WH3802> of mount<WH2022> Jearim<WH3297> on the north<WH6828> (the same is Chesalon<WH3693>), and went down<WH3381> to Beth-shemesh<WH1053>, and passed along<WH5674> by Timnah<WH8553>;

and the border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> unto the side<WH3802> of Ekron<WH6138> northward<WH6828>; and the border<WH1366> extended<WH8388> to Shikkeron<WH7942>, and passed along<WH5674> to mount<WH2022> Baalah<WH1173>, and went out<WH3318> at Jabneel<WH2995>; and the goings out<WH3318> of the border<WH1366> were at the sea<WH3220>.

And the west<WH3220> border<WH1366> was to the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>, and the border<WH1366> thereof<WH1366>. This is the border of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> round about<WH5439> according to their families<WH4940>.

And unto Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> he gave<WH5414> a portion<WH2506> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, according<WH413> to the commandment<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068> to Joshua<WH3091>, even Kiriath-arba<WH7151>, which Arba<WH704> was the father<WH1> of Anak<WH6061> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>).
And Caleb<WH3612> drove<WH3423> out thence the three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> of Anak<WH6061>: Sheshai<WH8344>, and Ahiman<WH289>, and Talmai<WH8526>, the children<WH3211> of Anak<WH6061>.
And he went up<WH5927> thence against the inhabitants<WH3427> of Debir<WH1688>: now the name<WH8034> of Debir<WH1688> beforetime<WH6440> was Kiriath-sepher<WH7158>.
And Caleb<WH3612> said<WH559>, He that smiteth<WH5221> Kiriath-sepher<WH7158>, and taketh<WH3920> it<WH5414>, to him will I give Achsah<WH5915> my daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802>.
And Othniel<WH6274> the son<WH1121> of Kenaz<WH7073>, the brother<WH251> of Caleb<WH3612>, took<WH3920> it<WH5414>: and he gave him Achsah<WH5915> his daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802>.

And it came to pass<WH935>, when she came unto him<WH5496>, that she moved him to ask<WH7592> of her father<WH1> a field<WH7704>: and she alighted from off<WH6795> her ass<WH2543>; and Caleb<WH3612> said<WH559>, What wouldest thou?

And she said<WH559>, Give<WH5414> me a blessing<WH1293>; for that thou hast set<WH5414> me in the land<WH776> of the South<WH5045>, give<WH5414> me also springs<WH1543> of water<WH4325>. And he gave<WH5414> her the upper<WH5942> springs<WH1543> and the nether<WH8482> springs<WH1543>.
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> according to their families<WH4940>.

And the uttermost<WH7097> cities<WH5892> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> toward the border<WH1366> of Edom<WH123> in the South<WH5045> were Kabzeel<WH6909>, and Eder<WH5740>, and Jagur<WH3017>,
and Kinah<WH7016>, and Dimonah<WH1776>, and Adadah<WH5735>,
and Kedesh<WH6943>, and Hazor<WH2674>, and Ithnan<WH3497>,
Ziph <WH2128>, and Telem<WH2928>, and Bealoth<WH1175>,
and Hazor<WH2674> - hadattah<WH2675>, and Kerioth<WH7152> - hezron<WH2696> (the same is Hazor<WH2674>),
Amam <WH538>, and Shema<WH8090>, and Moladah<WH4137>,
and Hazar-gaddah<WH2693>, and Heshmon<WH2829>, and Beth-pelet<WH1046>,
and Hazar-shual<WH2705>, and Beer-sheba<WH884>, and Biziothiah<WH964>,
Baalah <WH1173>, and Iim<WH5864>, and Ezem<WH6107>,
and Eltolad<WH513>, and Chesil<WH3686>, and Hormah<WH2767>,
and Ziklag<WH6860>, and Madmannah<WH4089>, and Sansannah<WH5578>,
and Lebaoth<WH3822>, and Shilhim<WH7978>, and Ain<WH5871>, and Rimmon<WH7417>: all the cities<WH5892> are twenty<WH6242> and nine<WH8672>, with their villages<WH2691>.
In the lowland<WH8219>, Eshtaol<WH847>, and Zorah<WH6881>, and Ashnah<WH823>,
and Zanoah<WH2182>, and En-gannim<WH5873>, Tappuah<WH8599>, and Enam<WH5879>,
Jarmuth <WH3412>, and Adullam<WH5725>, Socoh<WH7755>, and Azekah<WH5825>,
and Shaaraim<WH8189>, and Adithaim<WH5723>, and Gederah<WH1449>, and Gederothaim<WH1453>; fourteen<WH702> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Zenan <WH6799>, and Hadashah<WH2322>, and Migdal-gad<WH4028>,
and Dilean<WH1810>, and Mizpeh<WH4708>, and Joktheel<WH3371>,
Lachish <WH3923>, and Bozkath<WH1218>, and Eglon<WH5700>,
and Cabbon<WH3522>, and Lahmam<WH3903>, and Chitlish<WH3798>,
and Gederoth<WH1450>, Beth-dagon<WH1016>, and Naamah<WH5279>, and Makkedah<WH4719>; sixteen<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Libnah <WH3841>, and Ether<WH6281>, and Ashan<WH6228>,
and Iphtah<WH3316>, and Ashnah<WH823>, and Nezib<WH5334>,
and Keilah<WH7084>, and Achzib<WH392>, and Mareshah<WH4762>; nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Ekron <WH6138>, with its towns<WH1323> and its villages<WH2691>;
from Ekron<WH6138> even unto the sea<WH3220>, all that were by<WH3027> the side of Ashdod<WH795>, with their villages<WH2691>.

Ashdod <WH795>, its towns<WH1323> and its villages<WH2691>; Gaza<WH5804>, its towns<WH1323> and its villages<WH2691>; unto the brook<WH5158> of Egypt<WH4714>, and the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>, and the border thereof<WH1366>.
And in the hill-country<WH2022>, Shamir<WH8069>, and Jattir<WH3492>, and Socoh<WH7755>,
and Dannah<WH1837>, and Kiriath-sannah<WH7158> (the same is Debir<WH1688>),
and Anab<WH6024>, and Eshtemoh<WH851>, and Anim<WH6044>,
and Goshen<WH1657>, and Holon<WH2473>, and Giloh<WH1542>; eleven<WH259> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Arab <WH694>, and Dumah<WH1746>, and Eshan<WH824>,
and Janim<WH3241>, and Beth-tappuah<WH1054>, and Aphekah<WH664>,
and Humtah<WH2547>, and Kiriath-arba<WH7153> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>), and Zior<WH6730>; nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Maon <WH4584>, Carmel<WH3760>, and Ziph<WH2128>, and Jutah<WH3194>,
and Jezreel<WH3157>, and Jokdeam<WH3347>, and Zanoah<WH2182>,
Kain <WH7014>, Gibeah<WH1390>, and Timnah<WH8553>; ten<WH6235> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Halhul <WH2478>, Beth-zur<WH1049>, and Gedor<WH1446>,
and Maarath<WH4638>, and Beth-anoth<WH1042>, and Eltekon<WH515>; six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
Kiriath-baal <WH7154> (the same is Kiriath-jearim<WH7157>), and Rabbah<WH7237>; two<WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.
In the wilderness<WH4057>, Beth-arabah<WH1026>, Middin<WH4081>, and Secacah<WH5527>,
and Nibshan<WH5044>, and the City of Salt<WH5898>, and En-gedi<WH5872>; six<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.

And as for the Jebusites<WH2983>, the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> could<WH3201> not drive them out<WH3423>: but the Jebusites<WH2983> dwell<WH3427> with the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> at Jerusalem<WH3389> unto this day<WH3117>.
